- **Statistician** graduated from the Federal University of Sao Carlos (UFSCar), with an exchange at Budapest University of Technology (BME). **Master in Computer Science** at Federal University of ABC (UFABC), with research focused on the interpretability of black-box models in the context of Uplift Modeling.

- **Senior Data Scientist | Credit Modeling Specialist Statistician** with 10 years of experience in statistical modeling across different industries such as insurance, logistics, and primarily the financial market. **Assistant Professor** at Insper in the Advanced Data Science Program since April 2021.
